text: Castle Rock Spire () is in the Beartooth Mountains in the U.S. state of Montana. The peak is one of the tallest in the Beartooth Mountains, the seventh tallest in Montana and in the Absaroka-Beartooth Wilderness of Custer and Gallatin National Forests. Castle Rock Spire is only WSW of Castle Mountain. The Sundance Glacier lies on the north slopes of the peak. ==References== Castle Rock Spire Category:Beartooth Mountains Category:Mountains of Carbon County, Montana
title: Castle Rock Spire
